entry.title: Back to China!
entry.content:
It’s been a while before I realize my last post was last year Nov 18.

I agree with you, I’m lazy~

Anyway, many things happended over the past few mothes, and I would like to write them down (So I can refer to it years after).

  1. I got another gradute school admission offer from University of Wisconsin-Madison. TA position plus scholarship. Way better package thane the UCLA one. Yet, I have not decided where I should go for graduate school.

  2. I decided to spend the next 6 months in Hangzhou China for the following reasons: a) I believe family is very important, b) my working authorization expired (which I could extend, but I didn’t).

  3. Before going back to China, I spent my past 10 days in New Zealand. Thats right, New Zealand, the first country to see the sunrise. In fact, this post is writen in Auckland International Airport, where I have 2 hours before boarding the plane to Shanghai.

  4. I definitely will go back to U.S. for graudate school later this year. Which school? Not quite clear yet.

I’m back, China!

entry.title: First Grad School Admission
entry.content:
Last week, I received my first grad school admission offer!

Master of Science in Computer Science admission from UCLA(for those who don’t know, University of California Los Angeles!)

California, I’m coming!

entry.title: First Anniversary
entry.content:
这篇文章是写给妹纸看的，所以还是用中文比较好。

亲爱的WZ姐姐

https://fbcdn-sphotos-g-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpa1/v/t1.0-9/10452355_555059154603770_5262808059192557325_n.jpg?oh=4e983214c699c84d7882ca7c4e299472&oe=54C07048&__gda__=1422391536_6caf5429b0c48a39ef82e5c3a0626294" width="280" height="180"> 下午工作的时候想起来，今天已经是10/2了。
去年的这个时候，还是学生的我们在一起了。
于是现在已经一年了。
1年里，谢谢你的包容，理解，体贴（if any）。
未来谁也不好说，但是不管在哪，2013年到2014年的这1年我肯定是不会忘记的。
いろいろとありがとうございます!
本来呢，打算这个网站的主页换成一个WebGL的动画的。
但是吧，各种事情和GRE搞的我学习WebGL的过程异常的缓慢。
不过呢，这个网站的网址就当我给你的礼物了。
我自己注册的，是不是很厉害。
顺带一提，ivy-wes这个也是我注册的，会重新导到这里来。
明年的这个时候，WebGL应该可以完工啦，到时候记得来看哈。

最后，

周年纪念！
Happy Anniversary！
記念日おめでとう！

By Wesley Hui.
All right reserved.

entry.title: After Roadtrip
entry.content:
Well, it’s been a while without blogging anything. The reason for that is, of course, ROAD TRIP.

I have to keep this blogging thing away from my girlfriend. Otherwise, it won’t be a suprise gift. Right?

Couple of updates.

California is a beautiful place.

I’ve been to San Fransico and L.A before, but I didn’t rent a car back then. This time, we rent car and visited Yosemite (yeah, next version of Mac OS X). In general, CA is an awesome place.

For those of you haven’t get a chance to really appreciate CA, this video is good for you.

I passed the interview, but no offer? What? Seriously?

I actually interviewed with CapitalOne for a Data Engineer role in their plano office. The first day after interview, my point of contact told me I passed the interview and congrats. Cool. But two days after, she said they need to make an exception to give me offer because my situation is not expected (OPT/F1). Well, why did you interview me in the first place?

New AppleEvent

Hmm, I will not get Apple Watch. 350$ for a not that impressive watch. Not worth it. But iPhone 6 is actually something. The power of NFC is “Massive” by one of my colleages. If Apple will release a NFC SDK, it will be Apple’s Victory.

Lastly, I just want to see what’s the reaction of my girlfriend once she sees this website.

entry.title: July/15
entry.content:
Finally visited Hogwarts and Diagon Alley and brought wand for myself.

As a loyal Harry Potter Serise fan, I gotta say Orlando trip was amazing. Well done Universal Studio.

Now, got back to deal with Hadoop stuff.
